summary: During the weekly update meeting, the team discussed the critical relationship between the MVP and version 1 of the project. Howard outlined several key action items that need to be addressed to ensure progress. The focus was on clarifying workflows and formatting requirements for data and reports.
decisions: Emphasize the importance of the MVP to v1 relationship.

items.title: Create MVP requirements document
items.details: Draft a comprehensive document outlining the requirements for the MVP to ensure alignment with project goals.

items.title: Clarify Agg Data workflow
items.details: Provide a detailed explanation of the Agg Data workflow to eliminate any confusion among team members.

items.title: Develop visualization for aggregate database
items.details: Create a visual representation of the aggregate database to facilitate better understanding and usage.

items.title: Format preset reports and define data requirements
items.details: Establish formatting standards and data requirements for preset reports to ensure consistency and clarity.
